item.title: Quick Guide to Using Whimsical Diagrams with ChatGPT
item.description: Making mind-maps and diagrams helps organize your ideas and projects. This guide will show you how to use Whimsical Diagrams with ChatGPT. We will cover everything from setting it up, saving your work, export to picture to share with other people. Just follow these easy steps to use these helpful tools.
